plugin.name: Splitscreen_Scrollback
plugin.author: Fiendish
plugin.purpose: Split-screen view of the main output when backscrolling

muclient.script:
require "mw_theme_base" require "text_rect"
function at_bottom() cur_scroll_position = GetInfo(296) total_output_lines = GetInfo(224) text_rectangle_height = GetInfo(293) - GetInfo(291) + GetWorldWindowPosition().top text_rectangle_lines = text_rectangle_height / font_height max_scroll_line = total_output_lines - text_rectangle_lines - 1 max_scroll_position = (max_scroll_line * font_height) + GetWorldWindowPosition().top return cur_scroll_position == max_scroll_position end
win = GetPluginID()
function OnPluginCommandEntered(sText) if rect then go_back = GetInfo(296) end return sText end
function OnPluginScreendraw(type, log, line) if rect then rect:addStyles(GetStyleInfo(GetLinesInBufferCount())) rect:draw() end end
function OnPluginTick() font_height = GetInfo(212) if at_bottom() then if go_back then SetScroll(go_back) go_back = nil else WindowDelete(win) rect = nil end elseif text_rectangle_lines > 17 then local border_offset = GetInfo(276) local border_width = GetInfo(277) local left = GetInfo(290) - border_offset - border_width local right = GetInfo(292) + border_offset + border_width local bottom = GetInfo(293) + border_offset + border_width local width = right - left local height = font_height*15 + 4*border_offset - Theme.TITLE_PADDING - 1 local top = bottom - height
if ( (WindowInfo(win, 1) ~= left) or (WindowInfo(win, 2) ~= top) or (WindowInfo(win, 3) ~= width) or (WindowInfo(win, 4) ~= height) ) then -- build the window if it isn't where we want it to be local font_size = GetOption("output_font_height") if not WindowInfo(win, 1) then WindowCreate(win, left, top, width, height, 0, miniwin.create_absolute_location + miniwin.create_keep_hotspots, Theme.SECONDARY_BODY) WindowFont(win, "body", GetAlphaOption("output_font_name"), font_size, false, false, false) else WindowPosition(win, left, top, 0, miniwin.create_absolute_location + miniwin.create_keep_hotspots) WindowResize(win, width, height, Theme.SECONDARY_BODY) end local l , t, r, b = Theme.DrawBorder(win) t = Theme.DrawTitleBar(win, "body", "-- RECENT --") rect = TextRect.new(win, "rect", l, t, r, b, 15, false, Theme.PRIMARY_BODY, border_offset, GetAlphaOption("output_font_name"), font_size) local num_lines = GetLinesInBufferCount() for i=math.min(num_lines-1, rect.rect_lines),1,-1 do rect:addStyles(GetStyleInfo(num_lines - i)) end rect:draw() WindowShow(win, true) CallPlugin("abc1a0944ae4af7586ce88dc", "BufferedRepaint") end end end
function OnPluginClose() OnPluginDisable() end
function OnPluginDisable() WindowDelete(win) rect = nil end
